attributes.action: Make it mandatory for all supermarkets to have twin baby trollies.
attributes.additional_details:
With prices nowadays allot of people have to shop smartly and for me, I can only shop in about 2 different places. Neither of which have twin baby trollies for me to use.
Which will cause huge issue if I could not get support.
attributes.background:
As a mother of twins, not having twin baby trollies at the supermarket makes it impossible to get around. 
I have to bring my pram inside just to get a couple bits or even if it's a weekly/monthly shop! Absolute nightmare.
Some mothers of multiples get no help, so I see this as really important.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for supermarkets to make.
